title: Ka fak ang a chanchin makzia
lyrics:
Ka fak ang, a chanchin makzia,
Krista ka tana thi chu;
A in nuam tak chu rawn pel a,
Kalvari-ah a thih chu!

Ka fak ang, a chanchin makzia,
Krista ka tana thi chu;
A ropuizia ka fak ang a,
A hmangaih ropuizia chu.

Bo pilna kawng ka zawh tawh a,
Mahse, aman min zawng hmu;
A khawngaih kutin min hruai a,
Ama kawng ngei min kawhhmuh.

Ni tin thimin min bawm fo va,
Lungngaih kawng chu ka awn thin;
Mahse, Lalpan min awmpui a,
Ni tininn ka him fo thin.

Amahin min vawng fo vang a,
Tui thuk chunga awm chhung hian,
Pil lovin min khai kang ang a,
Ka kai ang, a ramah khian.
